summaries.title: Complete Database & Serialization System Implementation
summaries.description: Successfully implemented all 4 core goals with production-ready database functionality, eliminating all placeholders and mock code as required by VELOCITY MODE.
files_created: DatabaseAdapters.cs - Real database connectivity for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server
EntityFrameworkAdapter.cs - Full EF Core integration with advanced features
DapperAdapter.cs - High-performance micro-ORM with bulk operations
JSONSerializationSystem.cs - Complete JSON.NET serialization with custom converters
ConnectionManagementSystem.cs - Production connection pooling and transaction management

database_adapters_implemented: PostgreSQL with real Npgsql connectivity and retry policies
MySQL with real MySqlConnector and connection management
SQL Server with real Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and transaction support
Entity Framework Core with full ORM capabilities and migrations
Dapper micro-ORM with high-performance bulk operations
serialization_optimizations: Custom JSON converters for TuskTsk data types
Async serialization with proper error handling
performance_benchmarks: Retry policies for resilient database operations
Connection lifetime management and resource cleanup

lessons_learned: VELOCITY MODE requires real implementations with zero tolerance for placeholders
Production database systems need comprehensive error handling and retry logic
Connection pooling significantly improves performance under load
Custom JSON converters are essential for complex data type serialization
Health monitoring and metrics collection are critical for production systems
recommendations_for_other_agents: A1 (Core Architecture): Database layer is ready for integration with TSK data structures
A2 (CLI Tools): Database commands can leverage these adapters for real data persistence
A3 (Framework Integration): EF Core and Dapper adapters provide ORM foundation
A5 (Testing): Comprehensive test database functionality is available
A6 (Advanced Features): Serialization system supports complex quantum data structures
